page.title: 17Survey of North Boarhunt
page.content: A small survey of North Boarhunt showed that there is an even balance between the sexes and the trend is towards an ageing population. It was apparent, however, that young families are attracted to the area. {The residents have lived in North {Boarhunt on average between l5 and {3O years.}One resident had lived there all her 85 years. Properties vary in age. Some are as much as lOO years old. These older properties tend to be owner occupied, whereas the newer houses are council owned. Occupations among residents are varied. They include building workers, shop assistants and forestry workers. The car is the most popular mode of transport. Only relatively short distances were travelled to work. Local shopping was done in Fareham, Portsmouth or Waterlooville.
